document.full_text: colin campbell will step down before next season after 13 years in the job, with the mike shanahan, a 22-year playing veteran, taking over.
document.title: shanahan replacing campbell as n.h.l.'s chief disciplinarian
lines_and_colors: colin campbell will step down before next season after 13 years in the job, with the mike shanahan, a 22-year playing veteran, taking over.
